title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
OB: When a field is selected in the Type Hierarchy view, nothing happens when the user selects the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' option in the context menu for a field in the Type Hierarchy view should either be removed, or should add the Javadoc for the selected field.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 2. Select a field in the view.
